item.title: LDJAM Bot tweets your Ludum Dare games!
item.description:
I had been itching to try and make some cool stuff with Python for days now. So today I had this idea for a Twitter bot that selects a random game from the Ludum Dare website and tweets it along with the dev’s username and the game’s primary screenshot.

Check out LDJAM Bot here!
